name: Gomycode protect Ivory Coast heritage
description:
This game has been pushed by Go My code Abidjan in Ivory Coast, it's a coding school freshly arrived in the city.

This game was made by the game dev department and in partnership with some museum and cultural place in Ivory Coast.

It's about the protection and preservation of the Culture in the country,  reflect the truthful situation that African Culture "was" suffering in real life.
